Title: Icche
Writer: Suchitra Bhattacharya (story), Shibprasad Mukhopadhyay (dialogue), Shibprasad Mukhopadhyay (screenplay), Nandita Roy (dialogue), Nandita Roy (screenplay)
Actors: Sohini Sengupta Halder, Bratya Basu, Samadarshi Dutta, Ruplekha Mitra
Plot: Manas is an insurance agent. He lives with his wife Mamata and son Souvik. Mamata is dissatisfied by her husband's outlook and dreams of bringing up her son differently. But, when Souvik ...
